column4: Does anyone have a handy guide on How-To get steam working in ubuntu 7.10?
http://www.linux-gamers.net/modules/wiwimod/index.php?page=HOWTO+Steam&back=HOWTO+INDEX+Wine+Games
im new to ubuntu and finding it difficult to install steam:S
it needs an html engine to render steam store page...and it prompts you to install it clikc install
It just shows me the error message then quits I cant install it because it quits immidiately
type in terminal wine --version
what version you got?
yes
get the latest one from winehq.com
makes a big difference
it seems to work now:D:D
you still have to get the latest one, cause it improves significantly with every little realease
ok
do I need to go through installation again?
no just install new wine deb your fake windows installation remains untouched
just follow the instructions for gutsy on winehq.com and you'll be fine
check pm
downloaded??
follow this http://www.winehq.org/site/download-deb
now all of a sudden my sound has disappeared. I pressed audio in wine, and it said something about installed drivers. But now Its gone?
